text: Saint-Bruno station is a commuter rail station operated by Exo in Saint-Bruno- de-Montarville, Quebec, Canada. It is served by the Mont-Saint-Hilaire line. == Connecting bus routes == === Réseau de transport de Longueuil === {|class="wikitable" ! style="background: #; font-size:100%; color:#FFFFFF;" colspan="4" |Réseau de transport de Longueuil |- ! No. ! Route Name ! Service Times ! title: Saint-Bruno station
